title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip')
4. Begin exporting to the zip file

OB: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails. An error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export, with the file of the same name in project 2 being highlighted as the problem.

EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file that includes all selected projects, even if they have files with the same name.

SR: Follow the steps mentioned above to reproduce the issue.
